document_data.name: Growing Mountains
document_data.mainbody: The '''Growing Mountains''' were a small isolated mountain range found in the northern regions of the [[Katakoro Plateau]] in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: The mountains sat between [[Nor Tso]] to the south and the peak of [[Shan Pi]] and the eastern arm of [[Katakoro Shan]] to the north. The [[Old Caravan Road]] passed underneath the northern shadow of the Growing Mountains.
document_data.Description: The presence of sheer rock walls made the Growing Mountains an ideal place for the fortress monastery of [[Punakha Dzong]].
